data.system_settings: Samsung Galaxy J7 Prime ~ Android 7.0 SE 8.1
data.actual_result: A toast referring to roles even though it is a user permission overwrite, which is "Your role does not have permission to access this channel."
data.expected_result: A toast saying something along the lines of "You do not have permission to access this channel."
data.short_description: Joining a voice channel with a user permission overwrite to not connect will refer to role permissions in the toast
data.steps_to_repro: - Ask a friend who can manage channels in a server - Tell them to add a user(you) permission overwrite to a voice channel - Let them deny your permissions to Connect - Click on the VC - Click on the greyed out Channel Locked bar
